loadXMLDocument

public static org.jdom.Document loadXMLDocument(java.lang.String xmlString)
Loads the given XML string into a DOM Document. If the string isn't a valid XML document then null is returned.

Returns:
A xml Document that can be parsed afterwards. Null is returned if the string contains incorrect data (no XML).

Load an XML Document

Parameters:
fileName - Filename of the XML document to be loaded and returned.
Returns:
Document or null on error (written to error log)

Parameters:
resource - Name of the resource (XML file name).
